summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the performance test. Investigate the cause and optimize the page to improve its load time, TTFB, and FCP.
insights: Ensure that all pages, especially the "How It Works" page, are optimized for performance, including image compression, minification of CSS and JavaScript, and caching.
Monitor and analyze server response times to identify any potential bottlenecks or issues impacting TTFB.
Regularly test and evaluate web performance to maintain a positive user experience and address any emerging issues proactively.
